resources.string: The server could not understand the request. Please check your inputs.
Your credentials are wrong. You don\'t have access to this.
You do not have permission to access this resource.
Whoops. The data is nowhere to be found.
Whoops. There was an error on the server. If it persists, you should contact your admin!
There was an error while accessing the server. Try again or contact your admin!
Your network connection seems to be instable. Please try again later.
Something bad happened. Inform your admin if it happens again!
You have already shared your location with everyone on your server.
Do you want to stop sharing your location with %1$s? You can renew the share at any time.
Whoop! Welcome to the best server in the world. Log in to share your location.
The login details are incorrect. Please try again.
Don\'t have an account? Register here.
You need to choose a server. You can host it yourself, or use a friend\'s server.
We need permission to access your precise location when the app is open. This location is only used to display it on the map.
Great! We have access to your location when the app is open. But to track and share your location in the background, we also need permission to access your background location.
All set! We have access to your location in the background and when the app is open.
